import "./App.css"; import { useState } from "react"; import BookShelveElement from "./components/BookShelveElement"; import BookShelfChanger from "./components/BookShelfChanger"; import BookShelve from "./components/BookShelve"; const App = () => { const [showSearchPage, setShowSearchpage] = useState(false); return (
{showSearchPage ? (
setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)} > Close
    ) : (

    MyReads

    Want to Read

    Read

    setShowSearchpage(!showSearchPage)}>Add a book
    )}
    ); } export default App;
